verses.verse: And as for me <S%H259><s%>, in the first year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the Mede <S%H4075><s%>, I stood <S%H5977><s%> up to confirm <S%H2388><s%> and strengthen him <S%H4581><s%>.

And now will I show <S%H5046><s%> thee the truth <S%H571><s%>. Behold <S%H5975><s%>, there shall stand up yet three <S%H7969><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> in Persia <S%H6539><s%>; and the fourth <S%H7243><s%> shall be far <S%H6239><s%> richer <S%H6238><s%> than they all <S%H1419><s%>: and when he is waxed strong <S%H2393><s%> through his riches <S%H6239><s%>, he shall stir up <S%H5782><s%> all against the realm <S%H4438><s%> of Greece <S%H3120><s%>.

And a mighty <S%H1368><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> shall stand up <S%H5975><s%>, that shall rule <S%H4910><s%> with great <S%H7227><s%> dominion <S%H4474><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> according to his will <S%H7522><s%>.

And when he shall stand up <S%H5975><s%>, his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> shall be broken <S%H7665><s%>, and shall be divided <S%H2673><s%> toward the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, but not to his posterity <S%H319><s%>, nor according to his dominion <S%H4915><s%> wherewith he ruled <S%H4910><s%>; for his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> shall be plucked up <S%H5428><s%>, even for others besides these <S%H312><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> shall be strong <S%H2388><s%>, and one of his princes <S%H8269><s%>; and he shall be strong <S%H2388><s%> above him <S%H4910><s%>, and have dominion; his dominion <S%H4475><s%> shall be a great <S%H7227><s%> dominion <S%H4474><s%>.

And at the end <S%H7093><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> they shall join themselves together <S%H2266><s%>; and the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> an agreement <S%H4339><s%>: but she shall not retain <S%H6113><s%> the strength <S%H3581><s%> of her arm <S%H2220><s%>; neither shall he stand <S%H5975><s%>, nor his arm <S%H2220><s%>; but she shall be given up <S%H5414><s%>, and they that brought <S%H935><s%> her <S%H3205><s%>, and he that begat her <S%H2388><s%>, and he that strengthened her in those times <S%H6256><s%>.

But out of a shoot <S%H5342><s%> from her roots <S%H8328><s%> shall one stand up <S%H5975><s%> in his place <S%H3653><s%>, who shall come <S%H935><s%> unto the army <S%H2428><s%>, and shall enter <S%H935><s%> into the fortress <S%H4581><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, and shall deal <S%H6213><s%> against them <S%H2388><s%>, and shall prevail.

And also their gods <S%H430><s%>, with their molten images <S%H5257><s%>, and with their goodly <S%H2532><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> and of gold <S%H2091><s%>, shall he carry <S%H935><s%> captive <S%H7628><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and he shall refrain <S%H5975><s%> some years <S%H8141><s%> from the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>.
And he shall come <S%H935><s%> into the realm <S%H4438><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%>, but he shall return <S%H7725><s%> into his own land <S%H127><s%>.

And his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall war <S%H1624><s%>, and shall assemble <S%H622><s%> a multitude <S%H1995><s%> of great <S%H7227><s%> forces <S%H2428><s%>, which shall <S%H935><s%> come <S%H935><s%> on <S%H7857><s%>, and overflow, and pass through <S%H5674><s%>; and they shall return <S%H7725><s%> and war <S%H1624><s%>, even to his fortress <S%H4581><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> shall be moved with anger <S%H4843><s%>, and shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> with him <S%H4428><s%>, even with the king of the north <S%H6828><s%>; and he shall set forth <S%H5975><s%> a great <S%H7227><s%> multitude <S%H1995><s%>, and the multitude <S%H1995><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> into his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And the multitude <S%H1995><s%> shall be lifted up <S%H7311><s%>, and his heart <S%H3824><s%> shall be exalted <S%H7311><s%>; and he shall cast down <S%H5307><s%> tens of thousands <S%H7239><s%>, but he shall not prevail <S%H5810><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%>, and shall set forth <S%H5975><s%> a multitude <S%H1995><s%> greater <S%H7227><s%> than the former <S%H7223><s%>; and he shall <S%H935><s%> come <S%H935><s%> on at the end <S%H7093><s%> of the times <S%H6256><s%>, even of years <S%H8141><s%>, with a great <S%H7227><s%> army <S%H2428><s%> and with much <S%H7227><s%> substance <S%H7399><s%>.

And in those times <S%H6256><s%> there shall many <S%H7227><s%> stand up <S%H5975><s%> against the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%>: also the children of the violent <S%H1121><s%> among thy people <S%H5971><s%> shall lift <S%H5375><s%> themselves up to establish <S%H5975><s%> the vision <S%H2377><s%>; but they shall fall <S%H3782><s%>.

So the king <S%H4428><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%>, and cast up <S%H8210><s%> a mound <S%H5550><s%>, and take <S%H3920><s%> a well-fortified <S%H4013><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>: and the forces <S%H2220><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> shall not stand <S%H5975><s%>, neither his chosen <S%H4005><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, neither shall there be any strength <S%H3581><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%>.

But he that cometh <S%H935><s%> against him shall do <S%H6213><s%> according to his own will <S%H7522><s%>, and none shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H5975><s%>; and he shall stand in the glorious <S%H6643><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, and in his hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be destruction <S%H3617><s%>.

And he shall set <S%H7760><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> with the strength <S%H8633><s%> of his whole kingdom <S%H4438><s%>, and with him equitable <S%H3477><s%> conditions <S%H6213><s%>; and he shall perform them <S%H5414><s%>: and he shall give him the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of women <S%H802><s%>, to corrupt <S%H7843><s%> her <S%H5975><s%>; but she shall not stand, neither be for him.

After this shall he turn <S%H7760><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> unto the isles <S%H339><s%>, and shall take <S%H3920><s%> many <S%H7227><s%>: but a prince <S%H7101><s%> shall cause the reproach <S%H2781><s%> offered by him to cease <S%H7673><s%>; yea <S%H1115><s%>, moreover, he shall cause his reproach <S%H2781><s%> to turn upon him <S%H7725><s%>.

Then he shall turn <S%H7725><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> toward the fortresses <S%H4581><s%> of his own land <S%H776><s%>; but he shall stumble <S%H3782><s%> and fall <S%H5307><s%>, and shall not be found <S%H4672><s%>.

Then shall stand up <S%H5975><s%> in his place <S%H3653><s%> one <S%H5674><s%> that shall cause an exactor <S%H5065><s%> to pass through the glory <S%H1925><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4438><s%>; but within few <S%H259><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> he shall be destroyed <S%H7665><s%>, neither in anger <S%H639><s%>, nor in battle <S%H4421><s%>.

And in his place <S%H3653><s%> shall stand up <S%H5975><s%> a contemptible person <S%H959><s%>, to whom they had not given <S%H5414><s%> the honor <S%H1935><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4438><s%>: but he shall come <S%H935><s%> in time of security <S%H7962><s%>, and shall obtain <S%H2388><s%> the kingdom <S%H4438><s%> by flatteries <S%H2519><s%>.

And the overwhelming <S%H7858><s%> forces <S%H2220><s%> shall be overwhelmed <S%H7857><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H7665><s%>, and shall be broken; yea <S%H5057><s%>, also the prince of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

And after the league <S%H2266><s%> made with him he shall work <S%H6213><s%> deceitfully <S%H4820><s%>; for he shall come up <S%H5927><s%>, and shall become strong <S%H6105><s%>, with a small <S%H4592><s%> people <S%H1471><s%>.

In time of security <S%H7962><s%> shall he come <S%H935><s%> even upon the fattest places <S%H4924><s%> of the province <S%H4082><s%>; and he shall do <S%H6213><s%> that which his fathers <S%H1><s%> have not done <S%H6213><s%>, nor his fathers <S%H1><s%>' fathers <S%H1><s%>; he shall scatter <S%H967><s%> among them prey <S%H961><s%>, and spoil <S%H7998><s%>, and substance <S%H7399><s%>: yea <S%H2803><s%>, he shall devise his devices <S%H4284><s%> against the strongholds <S%H4013><s%>, even for a time <S%H6256><s%>.

And he shall stir up <S%H5782><s%> his power <S%H3581><s%> and his courage <S%H3824><s%> against the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> army <S%H2428><s%>; and the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> shall war <S%H1624><s%> in battle <S%H4421><s%> with an exceeding <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and mighty <S%H6099><s%> army <S%H2428><s%>; but he shall not stand <S%H5975><s%>; for they shall devise <S%H2803><s%> devices against him <S%H4284><s%>.

Yea <S%H398><s%>, they that eat of his dainties <S%H6598><s%> shall destroy <S%H7665><s%> him <S%H2428><s%>, and his army shall overflow <S%H7857><s%>; and many <S%H7227><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> down slain <S%H2491><s%>.

And as for both <S%H8147><s%> these kings <S%H4428><s%>, their hearts <S%H3824><s%> shall be to do mischief <S%H4827><s%>, and they shall speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%> at one <S%H259><s%> table <S%H7979><s%>: but it shall not prosper <S%H6743><s%>; for yet the end <S%H7093><s%> shall be at the time appointed <S%H4150><s%>.

Then shall he return <S%H7725><s%> into his land <S%H776><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> substance <S%H7399><s%>; and his heart <S%H3824><s%> shall be against the holy <S%H6944><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>; and he shall do <S%H6213><s%> his pleasure <S%H7725><s%>, and return to his own land <S%H776><s%>.

At the time appointed <S%H4150><s%> he shall return <S%H7725><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> into the south <S%H5045><s%>; but it shall not be in the latter <S%H314><s%> time as it was in the former <S%H7223><s%>.

For ships <S%H6716><s%> of Kittim <S%H3794><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> against him <S%H3512><s%>; therefore he shall be grieved, and shall return <S%H7725><s%>, and have indignation <S%H2194><s%> against the holy <S%H6944><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and shall do <S%H6213><s%> his pleasure <S%H7725><s%>: he shall even return, and have regard <S%H995><s%> unto them that forsake <S%H5800><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

And forces <S%H2220><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> on his part <S%H2490><s%>, and they shall profane the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, even the fortress <S%H4581><s%>, and shall take away <S%H5493><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5414><s%>, and they shall set up the abomination <S%H8251><s%> that maketh desolate <S%H8074><s%>.

And such as do wickedly <S%H7561><s%> against the covenant <S%H1285><s%> shall he pervert <S%H2610><s%> by flatteries <S%H2514><s%>; but the people <S%H5971><s%> that know <S%H3045><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> shall be strong <S%H2388><s%>, and do exploits <S%H6213><s%>.

And they that are wise <S%H7919><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%> shall instruct <S%H995><s%> many <S%H7227><s%>; yet they shall fall <S%H3782><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> and by flame <S%H3852><s%>, by captivity <S%H7628><s%> and by spoil <S%H961><s%>, many days <S%H3117><s%>.

Now when they shall fall <S%H3782><s%>, they shall be helped <S%H5826><s%> with a little <S%H4592><s%> help <S%H5828><s%>; but many <S%H7227><s%> shall join <S%H3867><s%> themselves unto them with flatteries <S%H2519><s%>.

And some of them that are wise <S%H7919><s%> shall fall <S%H3782><s%>, to refine <S%H6884><s%> them <S%H1305><s%>, and to purify, and to make them white <S%H3835><s%>, even to the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end <S%H7093><s%>; because it is yet for the time appointed <S%H4150><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> according to his will <S%H7522><s%>; and he shall exalt <S%H7311><s%> himself <S%H1431><s%>, and magnify himself above every god <S%H410><s%>, and shall speak <S%H1696><s%> marvellous things <S%H6381><s%> against the God <S%H410><s%> of gods <S%H410><s%>; and he shall prosper <S%H6743><s%> till the indignation <S%H2195><s%> be accomplished <S%H3615><s%>; for that which is determined <S%H2782><s%> shall be done <S%H6213><s%>.

Neither shall he regard <S%H995><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%>, nor the desire <S%H2532><s%> of women <S%H802><s%>, nor regard <S%H995><s%> any god <S%H433><s%>; for he shall magnify himself above all <S%H1431><s%>.

But in his place <S%H3653><s%> shall he honor <S%H3513><s%> the god <S%H433><s%> of fortresses <S%H4581><s%>; and a god <S%H433><s%> whom his fathers <S%H1><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not shall he honor <S%H3513><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>, and silver <S%H3701><s%>, and with precious <S%H3368><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and pleasant things <S%H2532><s%>.

And he shall deal <S%H6213><s%> with the strongest <S%H4581><s%> fortresses <S%H4013><s%> by the help of a foreign <S%H5236><s%> god <S%H433><s%>: whosoever acknowledgeth <S%H5234><s%> him he will increase <S%H7235><s%> with glory <S%H3519><s%>; and he shall cause them to rule <S%H4910><s%> over many <S%H7227><s%>, and shall divide <S%H2505><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> for a price <S%H4242><s%>.

And at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end <S%H7093><s%> shall the king <S%H4428><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> contend <S%H5055><s%> with him <S%H4428><s%>; and the king of the north <S%H6828><s%> shall come against him like a whirlwind <S%H8175><s%>, with chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and with horsemen <S%H6571><s%>, and with many <S%H7227><s%> ships <S%H591><s%>; and he shall enter <S%H935><s%> into the countries <S%H776><s%>, and shall overflow <S%H7857><s%> and pass through <S%H5674><s%>.

He shall enter <S%H935><s%> also into the glorious <S%H6643><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, and many <S%H7227><s%> countries shall be overthrown <S%H3782><s%>; but these shall be delivered <S%H4422><s%> out of his hand <S%H3027><s%>: Edom <S%H123><s%>, and Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and the chief <S%H7225><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>.
He shall stretch forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> also upon the countries <S%H776><s%>; and the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall not escape <S%H6413><s%>.

But he shall have power <S%H4910><s%> over the treasures <S%H4362><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> and of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and over all the precious <S%H2532><s%> things of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and the Libyans <S%H3864><s%> and the Ethiopians <S%H3569><s%> shall be at his steps <S%H4703><s%>.

But tidings <S%H8052><s%> out of the east <S%H4217><s%> and out of the north <S%H6828><s%> shall trouble <S%H926><s%> him <S%H3318><s%>; and he shall go forth with great <S%H1419><s%> fury <S%H2534><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> and utterly to sweep away <S%H2763><s%> many <S%H7227><s%>.

And he shall plant <S%H5193><s%> the tents <S%H168><s%> of his palace <S%H643><s%> between the sea <S%H3220><s%> and the glorious <S%H6643><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>; yet he shall come <S%H935><s%> to his end <S%H7093><s%>, and none shall help him <S%H5826><s%>.
